Original:
IG:bar_runner_elijah

福昊室 FullHouse
在”酒吧街”的樂利路上，有著溫暖紳士風的FullHouse。FullHouse意指滿座，就算店外看起來低調寧靜，一到夜晚人們都會自動來到這沉澱、放鬆又或著解放自己。
住在樂利路上的居民很有福氣，想喝一杯就可以有多家選擇，而且隔音很好不太會吵到街坊鄰居。而且FullHouse可是有地下KTV包廂，不管是裝潢、空間設計，整體都感到舒適用心，平日來包廂低消也很平宜噢。

吧吧節特調 - Fullhouse VIP昊室桂客2.0
光是杯具就太吸引我了，就像在品級品茶般。不是只有外觀滿分，味道也跟造型一樣滿分。因應茶道，有了綠茶的回甘，蘭姆為基底，有青蘋果的香氣，茶、果、酒一次享用。放在調酒旁邊的是特製威士忌桂花凍，桂花凍甜甜的還帶點威士忌迷人香氣，吃一口、喝一口，會發現不同層次的出現，令人驚嘆的一杯。

吧吧節特調Shot - Symphony 交響曲
酒凍Shot可沒聽過吧，最下層紫色是Gin染蝶豆花、百香果的Vodka、柳橙柑橘的Tequila。三種酒和甜甜的果實元素，搭配香檸蘇打水，氣泡使香氣更在口腔綻放，使享受更上一層。

醉美金蘋果
金萱和香甜的蘋果結合，帶點洋甘菊點綴，香氣十足，酒感適中，雖說是馬丁尼這類短飲型的，算作為第一杯也是能接受的。
EN:
IG: Bar_runner_elijah

Fuhao Room Fullhouse
On the "Bar Street", Leli Road, with a warm gentleman style Fullhouse.Fullhouse means full of seats. Even if the shop looks low -key and quiet, people will automatically come to this settlement, relax or liberate themselves at night.
The residents who live on Leli Road are very blessed. If you want to drink a drink, you can have multiple choices, and the sound insulation is not very good at the neighbor neighbor.And Fullhouse has an underground KTV box. Whether it is decoration or space design, the whole feels comfortable and dedicated.

Bar Bar Special -Fullhouse VIP Haoji Guike 2.0
It's so attractive to me, just like tea tasting.It is not just full of appearance, and the taste is as full as the shape.In response to the tea ceremony, with the green tea back, Rim is the base, and the aroma of green apples is enjoyed at a time.Next to the bartending is the special whiskey osmanthus frozen. The sweet -scented osmanthus is sweet and a whiskey is charming. If you take a bite and take a bite, you will find that the appearance of different levels is amazing.

Barbar Special SHOT -Symphony Symphony
I have n’t heard of the wine frozen Shot. The bottom purple is GIN dyed butterfly beancurd, Vodka of passion fruit, and orange citrus Tequila.Three kinds of wine and sweet fruit elements, with fragrant soda water, the bubbles make the aroma bloom more in the mouth, making the enjoyment even more.

Drunk US dollar apple
The combination of Jin Xuan and the sweet apple, with a bit of chamomile embellishment, full of aroma, and moderate wine. Although it is a short -drink type such as Martini, it is also acceptable as the first cup.

Original:
老闆原本是別家酒吧的店長，但是他表示其實在酒這個行業，再怎麼往上升，總是會遇到一個頂在，那為何不利用自身多年經驗自己開一間店，開一間屬於自己想要的酒吧。其實在很多行業都是這樣的，不管是科技業或是許多產業，大家都會有一個天花板，那個天花板要突破要經過腥風血雨，而因此很多有自己想法，有自己想做的事情的人紛紛出走前東家，自立門戶開啟新的公司，但是這樣真的好嗎？來看看國際上相對而言經濟發展比台灣進步的國家，很多都是擁護大公司，而中小型企業較少，為什麼呢？另外可以看到Facebook、Google、Amazon、Apple，不管是策略上或是行為上都希望可以壟斷市場，而收購或是打壓世界各地的新創公司，在這樣的生態圈中又該怎麼脫穎而出？就算真的起頭了，一時的成功並不代表可以永續經營，甚至如何追上或是超越龍頭又是一個很深的問題。

歡迎追蹤IG: @alcoholneal 來認識更多酒吧
EN:
The boss was originally the manager of other bars, but he said that in the wine industry, how to rise in the wine industry, he will always encounter a top, so why not use his many years of experience to open a store and open one belong to himself Want bar.In fact, this is the case in many industries. Whether it is the technology industry or many industries, everyone will have a ceiling. The ceiling must break through the blood and rain. Therefore, many people who have their own ideas and what they want to do have left before leaving. The owner, the self -reliance portal opens a new company, but is this really good?Let's take a look at the countries that have relatively economic development in the world. Many countries that have improved than Taiwan are supporting large companies, and there are fewer small and medium -sized enterprises. Why?In addition, you can see Facebook, Google, Amazon, Apple, whether it is strategies or behaviors, you hope to monopolize the market, and how can you buy or suppress new companies from all over the world to stand out in such an ecosystem?Even if it really starts, the success of the moment does not mean that it can be operated sustainable, and even how to catch up or surpass the leader is a deep problem.

Welcome to track: @alcoholneal to get to know more bars
